text: Tavaraka anri, oru muhmin piritoru muhminai kolai ceyvatu akumanatalla. Unkalil evarenum oru muhminai tavaraka kolai ceytuvittal, atarkup parikaramaka muhminana or atimaiyai vitutalai ceyya ventum; avanutaiya kutumpattarukku nasta itu kotukka ventum - avanutaiya kutumpattar (nasta ittut tokaiyai mannittu) atai tarmamaka vittaloliya kollappatta avan unkal pakai inattaic carntavanaka (anal) muhminaka iruntal, muhminana or atimaiyai vitutalai ceytal potum (nasta itillai. Iranta) avan unkalutan camatana (utanpatikkai) ceytu konta vakupparaic cerntavanaka iruntal avan contakkararukku nasta itu kotuppatutan, muhminana or atimaiyai vitutalai ceyyavum ventum;. Ivvaru (parikaram) ceyvatarku caktiyillatavanaka iruntal, allahvitam mannippup peruvatarkakat totarntu irantu matankal nonpu vaikka ventum - allah nanku arintavanakavum, purana nanamutaiyavanakavum irukkiran
